welcome_message_body: Welcome to Coacalco, Mexico! Get ready to immerse yourself in the vibrant culture, delicious cuisine, and the charming atmosphere of this beautiful city. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Coacalco has to offer.

restaurants.name: Pasteleria La Esperanza
restaurants.description: Pasteleria La Esperanza is a bakery located in Coacalco de Berriozával.
restaurants.address: Via Jose Lopez Portillo (Venustiano Carranza), Coacalco de Berriozával, México

restaurants.name: La Casa De Toño
restaurants.description: La Casa De Toño is a mexican restaurant located in Coacalco de Berriozával.

restaurants.name: La Casa De La Hamburguesa
restaurants.description: La Casa De La Hamburguesa is a burger joint located in Coacalco de Berriozával.
restaurants.address: Dalias (Blvd Coacalco), 55710 Coacalco de Berriozával, México

restaurants.name: Tacos El Cuy
restaurants.description: Tacos El Cuy is a taco restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Gibran, Comida Libanesa
restaurants.description: Gibran, Comida Libanesa is a middle eastern restaurant located in Coacalco de Berriozával.
restaurants.address: Av del Parque 85 (JM Baird), 55720 Coacalco de Berriozával, México
